text:
650k people have recovered from #Covid19 in Israel, which has vaccinated close to 4 million.

5,378 have died of the virus, 27 on Sunday alone. 

1,613 are in hospital, 1,008 rated as serious, 284 on respirators.

Now the recovered want the #vaccine too. 

You decide: Yes or No? https://t.co/DFqcpqR7Cv
